title: Carrier Digital Projects Lead
summary: Imagine what you could do here. The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Apple’s Sales organization generates the revenue needed to fuel our ongoing development of products and services.
description:
In this role, you will:
- Be responsible for executing holistic digital channel plans, roadmaps, and driving both Apple’s digital customer experience and business growth with strategic carrier accounts. Drive business development to identify innovative ways, strengthen partnership models, and develop online programs to sell Apple products through our carrier partners’ digital platforms. Collaborate with various partners and work with cross-functional teams to drive the overall success of the Carrier partnership and Apple’s sales growth.
key_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience. 8+ years of experience in a B2C eCommerce company, digital strategy consulting/agency, carrier, or digital business development. Understanding of and experience with the US mobile / carrier industry required. Strong proficiency in online product management and business development. Deep expertise in digital online/mobile commerce, digital customer experiences (CX), and digital marketing. Significant experience in developing growth strategies, preparing and conducting negotiations, and detailed analysis.
preferred_qualifications: Analytical and have a numerical aptitude to better analyze data. Ability to be accountable for results without direct control — orchestrating across teams, yours and others, to build and manage complex projects to drive digital programs and influence all levels of leadership. Passion around the consumer journey across digital channels and traditional mobile retailers. Ambition to take action and full of energy for new challenges. Solid ability to inspire and communicate effectively by influencing and collaborating across multiple internal and external teams.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $143,900 and $216,900, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan.
